block_comment: This block of code is for generating data patterns in specific scenarios. When the total number of Data Query (DQ) pins equals 56, and the data pattern is either "DGEN_NEIGHBOR", "DGEN_WALKING1", "DGEN_WALKING0" or "DGEN_ALL", this block will activate. The function is implemented using a Generate If statement. It's sensitive to the positive edge of the input clock, meaning it will execute on a rising edge of the clock signal.
